description.japanese: 1ルーム内の全サル神を救助

description.english: Exit a room with 3 or more keys in your pocket
description.spanish: Sal de una habitación con 3 o más llaves en tu bolsillo

description.schinese: 离开房间时有三把及以上钥匙
